definition: to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
to plan/to seek/scheme
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
surname Ce
variant of 策[ce4]

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
variant of 策[ce4]

sentences.english: He has no PR people advising him.
sentences.chinese: 他身边没有公关人员替他出谋划策。

sentences.english: Post a topic, and someone will definitely help you out.
sentences.chinese: 发布一个主题，绝对会有人给你出谋划策的。

sentences.english: Friends who have wonderful ideas please don’t be shy and bring forward your suggestions on our group, if you got the talent, don’t waste it.
sentences.chinese: 有好的建议的朋友请在后面跟贴，为团队出谋划策。

sentences.english: Unlike Best and Gascoigne, he has been shrewdly advised.
sentences.chinese: 不同于贝斯特和加斯科因，他身边一直有人出谋划策。

sentences.english: The discussions focused on seeking new ideas for a Middle East peace.
sentences.chinese: 本届会议致力于为中东和平的实现出谋划策。

definition: to offer advice/to make a suggestion
think tank/brain trust
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
to express an opinion/to offer advice
to resolve a difficult situation and leave worries behind (idiom)
(old) military counselor/(coll.) trusted adviser
to share tribulations/to help sb with worries and difficulties
to scheme/to plot/conspiracy
to show sb how to get to the right path
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
to wave flags and shout battle cries (idiom); to egg sb on/to give support to
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
resourceful/full of stratagems
to follow everywhere/to always be there for sb at their beck and call
to assist (usually a ruler)
